name: Short Robusto
brand: Smoking Jacket Cigars (by Hendrik Kelner Jr.)
additionalNotes:
Kelner Jr. used 2 different wrappers for this project,  The Favoritos and Short Robusto shares a Dominican Cotuí wrapper, a leaf Kelner
describes as a “family reserve tobacco” that is being grown by his sister, Monika Kelner, at her family land and for use exclusively at
Kelner’s factory.
